hours_text:
## ON VIEW

### [Jessica Gonzales: Mask of Many StoriesDecember 2025 - December 2026  
On view in the Kasser Vestibule  
  
Jessica Gonzales is a Tucson-based artist and muralist whose work navigates the shifting terrain of identity, culture, and belonging. This mural features a cat-like mask design inspired by Mexican folk art from TMA’s collection. Contained within Jessica Gonzales’s work are many interconnected elements representing Southern Arizona’s cultural and artistic heritage.](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105233929/https://www.tucsonmuseumofart.org/exhibition/mask-of-many-stories/ "IMG_2332")### [Implied Narratives: Selections from the TMA Photography CollectionKenneth J. and Judith H. Riskind/Patricia Carr Morgan and Peter F. Salomon Gallery  
Summer 2024-Summer 2025](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105233929/https://www.tucsonmuseumofart.org/exhibition/implied-narratives-selections-from-the-tma-photography-collection/ "Anh-Thuy Nguyen, Boat Journey series In transition, Honolulu #1 \(1\)")### [Contemporary Art: Vibration, Rhythm, PulseGreen Gallery  
October 19, 2024 – September 28, 2025](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105233929/https://www.tucsonmuseumofart.org/exhibition/contemporary-art-vibration-rhythm-pulse/ "Exhibit374-1 Contemporary Art install photo")### [Art of the Ancient AmericasKasser Family Wing of Latin American Art  
Ongoing](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105233929/https://www.tucsonmuseumofart.org/exhibition/ancient-americas/ "PC009")

[VIEW ...
